comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wiener_B%C3%B6rse Wiener Börse is one of the world's oldest exchanges and was founded in 1771 during the reign of Empress Maria Theresa of Austria in order to provide a market for state issued bonds.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Hi Richard Arthur Norton: Thank you for the link to information about the Wiener Börse (Vienna Stock Exchange).  We will include some of it in the image description when we update.

comment._content: this photograph was taken around 1880 (according to the small trees at the Ringstrasse), please compare to a similar photograph: www.bildarchivaustria.at/Pages/ImageDetail.aspx?p_iBildID...
